sentences.en: Or perhaps the insouciant Rue Saint - Denis , where French Montrealers go to see and be seen.
sentences.cn: 也许是圣丹尼路上漫不经心的格调, 法裔蒙城人去那里欣赏别人和展示自己.

sentences.en: Programme-makers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentences.cn: 编程者似乎对大批量制造含暴力因素的产品处之漠然，毫无责任心。

sentences.en: Television producers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentences.cn: 电视制片人似乎对大量制作暴力节目抱着不负责任的无所谓的态度。

words.tran_cn: 无忧无虑；漫不经心；满不在乎
漫不经心的，漠不关心的；无忧无虑的

trans.tran_cn: 无忧无虑的，漠不关心的
trans.tran_en: An insouciant action or quality shows someone's lack of concern about something that they are expected to take more seriously
